libnetworkd::EventSubscriber

libnetworkd::EventSubscriber Class Reference

#include <EventManager.hpp>

List of all members.

Public Member Functions

virtual void handleEvent (Event *firedEvent)=0

Detailed Description

Abstract representation of the subscriber to an event.

Member Function Documentation

virtual void libnetworkd::EventSubscriber::handleEvent ( Event *  firedEvent  )  [pure virtual]

Invoked by the EventManager, each time one of the subscribed events is fired (directly or after some delay if specified).

Parameters:
[in] firedEvent The event that was fired.
